Classes/CGA_SettingsViewController.html#.abstract: Called when any of the TextFields change.

Classes/CGA_InfoViewController.html#/c:@.name: appNameLabel

Classes/CGA_InfoViewController.html#/c:@.name: mainTextView
Classes/CGA_InfoViewController.html#/c:@.abstract: The text view that displays most of the information for this screen.

Classes/CGA_InfoViewController.html#/c:@.name: appVersionLabel
Classes/CGA_InfoViewController.html#/c:@.abstract: The label just below the app name label, displaying the version.

Classes/CGA_InfoViewController.html#/c:@.name: copyrightButton
Classes/CGA_InfoViewController.html#/c:@.abstract: The button at the bottom that will link to the site.

Classes/CGA_InfoViewController.html#/s:1.name: _setUpAccessibility()
Classes/CGA_InfoViewController.html#/s:1.abstract: This sets up the accessibility and voiceover strings for the screen.

Classes/CGA_InfoViewController.html#/c:@.name: copyrightButtonHit(_:)
Classes/CGA_InfoViewController.html#/c:@.abstract: Called when the copyright button is hit.

Classes/CGA_InfoViewController.html#/c:@.name: viewDidLoad()
Classes/CGA_InfoViewController.html#/c:@.abstract: Called after the view data has been loaded.

Classes/CGA_InfoViewController.html#/c:@.name: viewDidDisappear(_:)

Classes/CGA_BaseViewController.html#/s:1.name: prefs
Classes/CGA_BaseViewController.html#/s:1.abstract: This is a simple accessor for the app persistent preferences.

Classes/CGA_BaseViewController.html#/c:@.name: backgroundGradientImage
Classes/CGA_BaseViewController.html#/c:@.abstract: This is the background gradient image behind each screen.

Classes/CGA_BaseViewController.html#/c:@.name: logoImage
Classes/CGA_BaseViewController.html#/c:@.abstract: This is the BlueVanClef logo image, displayed in the center of the screen.

Classes/CGA_BaseViewController.html#/c:@.name: viewDidLoad()
Classes/CGA_BaseViewController.html#/c:@.abstract: Called when the view has finished loading.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.name: continuouslyUpdatePeripherals
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.abstract: This will be a Boolean value. If true, then the scan will not use duplicate filtering (meaning that it will be continuously updating).

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.name: peripheralFilterIDArray
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.abstract: This will be an Array of String, containing the UUIDs of specific Peripherals for which we are filtering.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.name: serviceFilterIDArray
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.abstract: This will be an Array of String, containing the UUIDs of specific Services for which we are filtering.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.name: characteristicFilterIDArray
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.abstract: This will be an Array of String, containing the UUIDs of specific Characteristics for which we are filtering.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.name: minimumRSSILevel
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.abstract: This will be a signed Integer, with the minimum RSSI.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.name: discoverOnlyConnectableDevices
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.abstract: This will be a Bool, true, if we are filtering out non-connectable devices.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.name: allowEmptyNames
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.abstract: This will be a Bool, true, if we are allowing devices that don’t have names to be discovered.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.name: tableSelectionBackgroundColor
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.abstract: This will be a CGColor, indicating the color to use for the selected table cells.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.name: textColorForUnselectableCells
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.abstract: This will be a CGColor, indicating the color to use for the selected table cells.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.name: allKeys
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.abstract: These are all the keys, in an Array of String.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html.name: Keys
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html.abstract: This is an enumeration that will list the prefs keys for us.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.name: keys
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.abstract: This is a list of the keys for our prefs.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.name: continuouslyUpdatePeripherals
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.abstract: This is a Boolean value. If true, then the scan will not use duplicate filtering (meaning that it will be continuously updating).

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.name: discoverOnlyConnectableDevices
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.abstract: This is a Boolean value. If true, then devices that are not advertising as connctable will be ignored.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.name: allowEmptyNames
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.abstract: This is a Boolean value. If true, then devices that do not have names will be included. Default is false.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.name: minimumRSSILevel
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.abstract: This is a Boolean value. If true, then the scan will not use duplicate filtering (meaning that it will be continuously updating).

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.name: peripheralFilterIDArray
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.abstract: This is an Array of String, containing the UUIDs of specific Peripherals for which we are filtering.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.name: serviceFilterIDArray
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.abstract: This is an Array of String, containing the UUIDs of specific Services for which we are filtering.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.name: characteristicFilterIDArray
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.abstract: This is an Array of String, containing the UUIDs of specific Characteristics for which we are filtering.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.name: tableSelectionBackgroundColor
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.abstract: This is a CGColor, indicating the color to use for the selected table cells.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.name: textColorForUnselectableCells
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.abstract: This is a CGColor, indicating the color to use for the table cells that can’t be clicked.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.name: scanCriteria
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.abstract: This is the scan criteria object to be used for filtering scans.

Classes/CGA_AppDelegate.html#/s:13Blue_V.name: displayAlert(_:message:)
Classes/CGA_AppDelegate.html#/s:13Blue_V.abstract: Displays the given message and title in an alert with an “OK” button.

Classes/CGA_AppDelegate.html#/s:13Blue_V.name: createAdvertimentStringsFor(_:)
Classes/CGA_AppDelegate.html#/s:13Blue_V.abstract: This creates an Array of String, containing the advertisement data from the indexed device.

Classes/CGA_AppDelegate.html#/s:13Blue_V.name: createAdvertimentStringsFor(_:id:)
Classes/CGA_AppDelegate.html#/s:13Blue_V.abstract: This creates an Array of String, containing the advertisement data from the indexed device.

Classes/CGA_AppDelegate.html#/s:13Blue_V.name: lockOrientation(_:)
Classes/CGA_AppDelegate.html#/s:13Blue_V.abstract: This will change the app orientation mask to what is provided.

Classes/CGA_AppDelegate.html#/s:13Blue_V.name: lockOrientation(_:andRotateTo:)
Classes/CGA_AppDelegate.html#/s:13Blue_V.abstract: This will force the screen to ignore the accelerometer setting and force the screen into that orientation.

Classes/CGA_AppDelegate.html#/s:13Blue_V.name: unlockOrientation()
Classes/CGA_AppDelegate.html#/s:13Blue_V.abstract: This will return the app orientation to the state it was before the orientation was locked.

Classes/CGA_AppDelegate.html#/s:13Blue_V.name: centralManager
Classes/CGA_AppDelegate.html#/s:13Blue_V.abstract: This is the Bluetooth Central Manager instance. Everything goes through this.

Classes/CGA_AppDelegate.html#/s:13Blue_V.name: orientationLock
Classes/CGA_AppDelegate.html#/s:13Blue_V.abstract: Used to force orientation for the Settings screen.

Classes/CGA_AppDelegate.html#/s:13Blue_V.name: appDelegateObject
Classes/CGA_AppDelegate.html#/s:13Blue_V.abstract: Quick access to the app delegate object.

Classes/CGA_AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Blue_.name: application(_:supportedInterfaceOrientationsFor:)
Classes/CGA_AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Blue_.abstract: This is used to lock the orientation while the timer editor is up.

Classes/CGA_AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Blue_.name: applicationDidEnterBackground(_:)
Classes/CGA_AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Blue_.abstract: Called when the application is about to enter the background.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs/PrefsError.h.name: incorrectKeys(invalidElements:)
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs/PrefsError.h.abstract: Some elements were presented that do not fit our keys. The associated value is an Array of the failing keys.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs/PrefsError.h.name: valuesNotPlistCompatible(invalidElements:)
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs/PrefsError.h.abstract: Not all of the elements in the _values Dictionary are Plist-Compatible. The associated value is an Array of the failing keys.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs/PrefsError.h.name: noStoredPrefsForKey(key:)
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs/PrefsError.h.abstract: We were not able to find a stored pref for the given key. The associated value is the key we are looking for.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs/PrefsError.h.name: unknownError(error:)
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs/PrefsError.h.abstract: Unknown thrown error. The associated value is the error (if any).

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.name: _values
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.abstract: This is the Dictionary. It’s private, and shouldn’t need to be accessed outside this base class.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.name: _save()
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.abstract: This is a private method that saves the current contents of the _values Dictionary to persistent storage, keyed by the value of the “key” property.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.name: _load()
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.abstract: This is a private method that reads in the data from persistent storage for this instance (using the “key” property), and loads the _values Dictionary property.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs/PrefsError.h.name: PrefsError
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs/PrefsError.h.abstract: Errors that Can be thrown from methods in this class

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.name: key
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.abstract: This is the key that is used to store and fetch the collection of data to be used to populate the _values Dictionary.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.name: lastError
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.abstract: This is any error that was thrown during a save or a load.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.name: keys
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.abstract: This calculated property MUST be overridden by subclasses.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/c:@M@B.name: values
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/c:@M@B.abstract: This is an accessor for the _values Dictionary. Before it returns the Dictionary, it loads data from persistent storage.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.name: subscript(_:)
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.abstract: This is a direct-access subscript that allows you to use the prefs object to reach its stored properties.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/c:@M@B.name: init()
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/c:@M@B.abstract: The default initializer uses the current subclass typename as the main key.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.name: init(key:values:)
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.abstract: You can initialize instances with a key and some initial data values.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.name: clear()
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:13Bl.abstract: This clears the values, and deletes the pref from the UserDefaults.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html.name: RVS_PersistentPrefs
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html.abstract: This class is meant to act as an “abstract” base class, providing a simple Dictionary datastore that is stored in the UserDefaults in the Application Bundle. It is designed to be reliable, and extremely simple to use.

Classes/CGA_AppDelegate.html.name: CGA_AppDelegate
Classes/CGA_AppDelegate.html.abstract: The primary application delegate for the app.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html.name: CGA_PersistentPrefs
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html.abstract: This is the subclass of the preferences type that will provide our persistent app settings.

Classes/CGA_BaseViewController.html.name: CGA_BaseViewController
Classes/CGA_BaseViewController.html.abstract: This class exists only to manage the background, navbar and logo image.

Classes/CGA_InfoViewController.html.name: CGA_InfoViewController
Classes/CGA_InfoViewController.html.abstract: This controls the about this app view.

Classes/CGA_CharacteristicViewController.name: CGA_CharacteristicViewController_TableRow
Classes/CGA_CharacteristicViewController.abstract: This denotes one row of the table of Descriptors. Each row denotes one Descriptor.

Classes/CGA_InitialViewController_TableR.name: CGA_InitialViewController_TableRow
Classes/CGA_InitialViewController_TableR.abstract: This is a simple class that will be used to display one row in the initial discovery table.

Classes/CGA_InitialViewController.html.name: CGA_InitialViewController
Classes/CGA_InitialViewController.html.abstract: This controls the initial view, which is a basic table of discovered devices.

Classes/CGA_PeripheralViewController_Tab.name: CGA_PeripheralViewController_TableRow
Classes/CGA_PeripheralViewController_Tab.abstract: This is the class that defines one row of the table that displays the Services.

Classes/CGA_PeripheralViewController.htm.name: CGA_PeripheralViewController
Classes/CGA_PeripheralViewController.htm.abstract: This controls the Peripheral Information View.

Classes/CG_TapGestureRecognizer.html.name: CG_TapGestureRecognizer
Classes/CG_TapGestureRecognizer.html.abstract: This simply allows us to attach a row index to a gesture, so we know which Characteristic to use.

Classes/CG_TappableButton.html.name: CG_TappableButton
Classes/CG_TappableButton.html.abstract: This simply allows us to attach a row index to a button, so we know which Characteristic to use.
